name: Cooper & Hunter 12000 BTU Mini Split Ductless Air Conditioner

review.name: Perfect for my home office
review.reviewBody: Excellent mini split! Easy to install and very quiet. Cools my 400 sq ft home office perfectly and the WiFi app works great. Energy bills went down about 30% compared to my old window unit. The installation kit had everything I needed.

review.name: Great value for the price
review.reviewBody: We had a professional install this in our sunroom and it works amazing. Keeps the room at 72 degrees even when it's 95 outside. The heating function is also great for winter - tested it in December and it heats efficiently down to about 20Â°F outside temp. Very happy with this purchase!

review.name: Solid unit, minor learning curve
review.reviewBody: Unit works great once you figure out all the settings. The remote has a lot of options which was overwhelming at first. WiFi setup took a few tries but customer support helped me through it. Cooling performance is excellent - way better than expected. Taking off one star because the installation manual could be clearer.

review.name: Best mini split for the money
review.reviewBody: I've installed 3 of these Cooper & Hunter units in my house now. They're reliable, efficient, and the price is unbeatable. SEER 22 rating is real - my electric bill confirms it. Free shipping from MiniSplitsForLess was fast too. Arrived in 4 days. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a quality ductless system.

review.name: Good but outdoor unit is larger than expected
review.reviewBody: The mini split works great - cools my bedroom quickly and quietly. Only complaint is the outdoor condenser is bigger than I expected from the photos. Make sure you measure your installation space carefully. Other than that, no complaints. Good product.
